terms.title: Terms of use
terms.intro: Welcome to MindMeter! By using this website, you agree to the terms and conditions below. Please read them carefully before using our services.

1.title: Accept terms:
1.desc: By accessing and using MindMeter, you agree to these terms of use.

2.title: Changes to terms:
2.desc: MindMeter reserves the right to change, modify, or update the terms of use at any time without prior notice. You should regularly check for updates.

3.title: Intellectual property:
3.desc: All content, images, and data on MindMeter are owned by us. Copying, reproducing, or using for commercial purposes without permission is strictly prohibited.

4.title: Privacy policy:
4.desc: MindMeter commits to protecting the privacy of users according to the published privacy policy.

5.title: User responsibility:
5.desc: You commit to providing accurate information, not using the website for illegal purposes or harming others.

6.title: Limitation of liability:
6.desc: MindMeter is not responsible for any damage arising from the use of the website, including but not limited to the use of information, test results, advice on the page.

7.title: Contact:
7.desc: If you have any questions about the terms of use, please contact us via email: mindmeter.app@gmail.com

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
privacyPolicy.intro: We commit to protecting the privacy and personal information of our users. This policy explains in detail how we collect, use, store, protect, and process your personal information when you use our professional mental health support service. We understand that mental health information is extremely sensitive and we commit to protecting it with the highest level of security.

section1.title: 1. Information we collect
section1.intro: To provide the best service, we need to collect some necessary information:
section1.personalInfoDesc: Name, email, phone number, profile picture, date of birth, gender, address (if necessary for the service).
section1.loginInfoDesc: Username, password (encrypted with AES-256), JWT authentication token, two-factor login information (if applicable).
section1.socialInfoDesc: Google account ID, Facebook account ID, profile picture, linked email, basic profile information from social networks.
section1.technicalInfoDesc: IP address, browser type, version, device (computer, phone, tablet), operating system, access time, usage time.
section1.behaviorInfoDesc: Access history, actions on the website, test results, consultation profile, usage time of features, feedback and evaluation.
section1.healthInfoDesc: Results of depression, anxiety, stress, notes from experts, consultation history, treatment goals (if applicable).
section1.paymentInfoDesc: Credit card information (encrypted), transaction history, purchased service package, invoice information.

section2.title: 2. Purpose of using information
section2.intro: We use your information for the following purposes:
section2.purpose1: Securely verify and manage user accounts.
section2.purpose2: Support login, registration, password recovery, and account security.
section2.purpose3: Personalize the experience, provide accurate mental health assessments, and recommend appropriate solutions.
section2.purpose4: Send important notifications, confirmation emails, and valuable mental health resources (only when you consent).
section2.purpose5: Analyze data to improve service quality, optimize the interface, and strengthen system security.
section2.purpose6: Comply with legal regulations, requests from regulatory authorities, and international data protection standards.
section2.purpose7: Provide customer support and efficiently handle your requests.
section2.purpose8: Research and develop new features to improve mental health services.

section3.title: 3. Sharing information
section3.intro: Our commitment to protecting your personal information:
section3.sharing1: We NEVER share your personal information with third parties, except with your explicit consent or when required by law.
section3.sharing2: Information may be shared with service providers (such as email verification, payment, cloud storage) but only within the necessary scope and strictly protected according to international standards.
section3.sharing3: We can share aggregated information, without identifying individuals, for research and service improvement purposes.
section3.sharing4: In case of emergency regarding health or safety, we may share necessary information with authorized medical institutions.
section3.sharing5: All our partners must sign strict confidentiality agreements and comply with the highest data protection standards.

section4.title: 4. Security measures
section4.intro: We apply multi-layered security measures to protect your information:
section4.security1: Data encryption: Passwords and sensitive data are encrypted with AES-256 and securely stored on the security system.
section4.security2: System security: We apply physical, technical, and administrative security measures to prevent unauthorized access, loss, or misuse of information.
section4.security3: Staff training: Staff is trained in data security and strictly follows data protection procedures according to ISO 27001 standards.
section4.security4: Security audits: The system is audited and updated regularly to ensure maximum security.
section4.security5: Controlled access: Only authorized personnel can access personal information, and all activities are logged.
section4.security6: Secure backup: Data is backed up periodically and stored at high-security data centers.

section5.title: 5. User rights
section5.intro: According to GDPR and the Personal Data Protection Law, you have the following rights:
section5.rights1: Access right: You have the right to access, view, and download your personal information at any time.
section5.rights2: Edit right: You can edit, update, or supplement inaccurate personal information.
section5.rights3: Delete right: You can request the complete deletion of your personal information from our system.
section5.rights4: Limit processing right: You can request limited processing of your personal information in certain cases.
section5.rights5: Data transfer right: You can request the transfer of your personal information to another system.
section5.rights6: Opposition right: You can object to the processing of your personal information for marketing purposes.
section5.rights7: Withdrawal of consent right: You can withdraw your consent to the processing of your personal information at any time.
section5.rights8: Complaint right: You have the right to file a complaint with the data protection authority if you feel your privacy has been violated.

section6.title: 6. Storage & Retention Time
section6.storage1: Security system: Personal information is stored on the high-security system of MindMeter with end-to-end encryption.
section6.storage2: Retention time: We only retain information for the necessary time for the purpose of use or according to the current legal regulations.
section6.storage3: Automatic deletion: Information that is no longer needed will be automatically deleted according to the scheduled plan.
section6.storage4: Deletion upon request: After you request account deletion, information will be deleted or hidden from the system within 30 days.
section6.storage5: Secure backup: Data is backed up periodically and can be restored in case of need.
section6.storage6: Regular audits: We audit and clean up unnecessary data periodically.

section7.title: 7. Cookie & Tracking Technology
section7.intro: Using cookies and tracking technology in a transparent and controlled manner:
section7.cookies1: Essential cookies: We use cookies to remember login information, maintain session work, and ensure basic features work.
section7.cookies2: Analytical cookies: These cookies help us understand how you use the website to improve user experience.
section7.cookies3: Personalized cookies: These cookies remember your preferences and settings to personalize your experience.
section7.cookies4: Cookie control: You can customize or disable cookies through browser security settings.
section7.cookies5: Impact when disabled: When disabling some cookies, some website features may be limited or not work properly.
section7.cookies6: Tracking technology: We may use technologies like pixel tracking, web beacons to improve services.

section8.title: 8. Links to Other Websites
section8.links1: Third-party links: Our website may contain links to third-party websites such as social media, payment services, or reference resources.
section8.links2: Not responsible: We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of third-party websites.
section8.links3: Check before accessing: We encourage you to read the privacy policies and terms of use of third-party websites before providing personal information.
section8.links4: Safe links: We only link to reputable websites with appropriate privacy policies.

section9.title: 9. Policy Updates
section9.changes1: Periodic updates: This policy may be updated to comply with new legal regulations, changes in services, or improve security processes.
section9.changes2: Notice before changes: We will notify you at least 30 days before the changes take effect.
section9.changes3: Email notification: Important changes will be sent to your registered email address.
section9.changes4: Website notification: All changes will be clearly displayed on the website with the effective date.
section9.changes5: Continue using: Continuing to use the service after policy changes is considered acceptance of the new policy.
section9.changes6: Store version: We store all policy versions for you to reference.

section10.title: 10. Contact & Support
section10.intro: If you have any questions, requests, or complaints related to the privacy policy, please contact us:
section10.address: Address: 36 XuÃ¢n Thá»§y, Cáº§u Giáº¥y, HÃ  Ná»i, Viá»t Nam
section10.responseTime: Response time: Within 24 hours of working hours

section11.title: 11. Compliance with Laws
section11.intro: Commitment to complying with data protection laws:
section11.compliance1: GDPR: Compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation of the European Union.
section11.compliance2: Vietnamese law: Compliance with Vietnamese network security and related regulations.
section11.compliance3: International standards: Applying ISO 27001 standards for information security management.
section11.compliance4: Regular audits: The system is audited by an independent third party for security.
section11.compliance5: Compliance report: We provide compliance reports upon request from regulatory authorities.

section12.title: 12. Commitment to Protecting Privacy
section12.intro: Strong commitment of MindMeter to protecting privacy:
section12.commitment1: Absolute security: We commit to protecting your personal information with the highest level of security.
section12.commitment2: Transparency: We commit to transparently collecting, using, and protecting your information.
section12.commitment3: User control: You have full control over your personal information.
section12.commitment4: Continuous improvement: We continuously improve security measures to protect you better.
section12.commitment5: Staff training: Our staff is trained continuously on data security and privacy.
section12.commitment6: Quick response: We commit to responding to privacy requests in the shortest possible time.

guide.title: Guide to using MindMeter services

sections.title: 1. Taking depression tests
content: Visit the homepage and select the appropriate test type (DASS-21, DASS-42, BDI, RADS, EPDS, SAS)
Read the instructions and questions carefully before answering
Answer all questions honestly and accurately
Click 'Submit Test' to view results
Note: Results are for reference only and do not replace professional medical diagnosis

sections.title: 2. Using AI Assistant
content: Click on the chatbot icon in the bottom right corner
Enter your question or problem you want to ask
AI will respond and provide appropriate advice
You can request to book an appointment with experts if needed
Note: Do not share sensitive personal information in chat

sections.title: 3. Booking appointments with experts
content: Access 'Consultation & Therapy' page from the menu
Choose a suitable expert from the list
View available slots and select a convenient time
Fill in contact information and describe your issue
Confirm the appointment and wait for expert response

sections.title: 4. Viewing test history
content: Access 'Test History' from personal menu
View all tests you have taken
Compare results over time
Export PDF reports for storage
Share results with experts when needed

sections.title: 5. Account management
content: Update personal information in 'Profile'
Change password regularly for security
Upgrade service plan to use premium features
Contact support if you encounter technical issues
Log out safely after use

sections.title: 6. Important notes
content: All personal information is absolutely confidential
Test results are for reference only, not medical diagnosis
If you have suicidal thoughts, contact experts or hotline 111 immediately
Use services responsibly and for the right purposes
Contact support via email: mindmeter.app@gmail.com

guide.footer: We hope you find MindMeter services useful and secure!

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.intro: MindMeter provides tests, information, and advice on mental health with the purpose of supporting, reference, and raising community awareness. However, we would like to note:

items.text: Tests and results on MindMeter are for reference only and do not replace professional medical diagnosis. You should consult a doctor or mental health professional if you have serious concerns.
While we strive to provide accurate information, we cannot guarantee 100% accuracy of all content. Information may change without prior notice.
Users must use the service responsibly and for the right purposes. Do not use information for self-diagnosis or treatment without professional supervision.
If you are having suicidal thoughts or intend to harm yourself, please contact hotline 111 immediately or go to the nearest hospital. MindMeter cannot replace emergency support.
MindMeter is not responsible for any consequences arising from the use of information on the website. Users are responsible for their own decisions.
While we commit to protecting personal information, we cannot guarantee 100% absolute security. Users should consider carefully before sharing sensitive information.

depressionTest.introTitle: Take online depression test â Depression test
depressionTest.introDesc1: Take depression tests to assess your depression level. These tests are designed to help mental health professionals assess the mood, symptoms, and severity of patients with depression. The results will include advice to help you get a basic overview of your depression level. <0>Note: These tests are not a medical diagnosis.</0>
depressionTest.introDesc2: The depression tests on the MindMeter website are completely free, simple, and easy to use. Start taking the test now

testHistory.title: Your test history
testHistory.noHistoryMessage: You have not taken any tests yet.
testHistory.needMoreTestsForChart: You need to take more tests to see the statistics chart.
testHistory.subtitle: Review your mental progress through each test

testListSection.title: Online Depression Tests
testListSection.description: The depression tests on <0>MindMeter</0> are built based on scientific research and reputable tools in the field of psychology and psychiatry. Each test is designed to help you identify early signs of depression, anxiety, stress, or other mental health issues. The results not only help you determine your current level but also provide guidance and direction to proactively care for your mental health. If you are feeling stressed, tired, or experiencing unusual changes in emotions, choose the appropriate test to check and receive timely advice.
testListSection.note: These tests do not replace professional diagnosis from doctors or mental health experts. If the results show a high risk, please proactively contact an expert for the best support.

DASS-21.label: IMPORTANT TEST
DASS-21.name: Anxiety â Depression â Stress Test (DASS 21)
DASS-21.description: DASS 21 (Depression Anxiety Stress Scale) is a deep assessment tool for depression, anxiety, and stress. The target for DASS 21 is people with symptoms of depression, anxiety, and stress, especially those experiencing stressful situations in life such as work pressure, family, or crisis events.
DASS-21.target: People with symptoms of anxiety, depression, and stress.
DASS-21.purpose: Evaluate and suggest appropriate treatment methods.

DASS-42.label: IMPORTANT TEST
DASS-42.name: Anxiety â Depression â Stress Test (DASS 42)
DASS-42.description: DASS 42 is an important tool for assessing the severity of anxiety, depression, and stress. Built based on scientific research, this test has been recognized for its accuracy and reliability in assessing the mental status of individuals. The target for DASS 42 includes people with symptoms of anxiety, depression, and stress.
DASS-42.target: People with symptoms of anxiety, depression, and stress.
DASS-42.purpose: Evaluate and suggest appropriate treatment methods.

RADS.label: PERIODIC TEST
RADS.name: Depression Test for Adolescents (RADS)
RADS.description: RADS (Reynolds Adolescent Depression Scale) is a tool used to detect and measure the severity of depression in adolescents. The accuracy and reliability of the RADS test have been confirmed by many studies, making it an important tool for researchers and mental health experts.
RADS.purpose: Test, detect, and treat with appropriate methods.

BDI.label: COMMON TEST
BDI.name: Beck Depression Inventory (BDI)
BDI.description: Beck Depression Inventory (BDI) is one of the most commonly used tools for measuring the severity of depression. Developed by Aaron T. Beck, this test has been studied and proven to be reliable and valid in many studies on mental health.
BDI.target: People with symptoms: fatigue, sadness, etc.
BDI.purpose: Test, detect, and suggest appropriate treatment methods.

EPDS.label: IMPORTANT TEST
EPDS.name: Postnatal Depression Scale (EPDS)
EPDS.description: EPDS (Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale) is an important tool used to measure the severity of depression after childbirth in women. Developed based on scientific research and clinical practice, EPDS has been proven to be reliable and feasible in screening and evaluating symptoms of postnatal depression.
EPDS.target: Women after childbirth with symptoms of depression.
EPDS.purpose: Evaluate and determine the severity of depression after childbirth in women.

SAS.label: COMMON TEST
SAS.name: Zung Self-Rating Depression Scale (SAS)
SAS.description: ZUNG (Zung Self-Rating Depression Scale) is a reliable and commonly used tool for measuring the severity of depression in individuals. Developed by William WK Zung, this test is widely used in clinical practice and research on mental health. By evaluating the symptoms of depression in four categories: mood, perception, functional decline, and emotional,â¦
SAS.purpose: Evaluate the severity and find treatment solutions.

studentTestPage.titleDASS21: Anxiety â Depression â Stress Test (DASS 21)
studentTestPage.titleDASS42: Anxiety â Depression â Stress Test (DASS 42)
studentTestPage.description:
Take tests to assess your depression, anxiety, and stress levels. These tests are designed to help mental health professionals evaluate the mood, symptoms, and severity of patients with depression. The results will include advice to help you get a basic overview of your depression level.

**Note: These tests are not a medical diagnosis.**
studentTestPage.question: Question

aboutSection.whyP1: Depression is not a small issue. If not detected and treated in time, it can have serious consequences on all aspects of life, including health, work, family, and social relationships. People with this disorder often feel tired, apathetic, and lose interest in activities they once enjoyed, and even have thoughts of suicide.
aboutSection.whyP2: Depression is a global issue affecting about 5% of the world's population. In Vietnam, according to data from the Ministry of Health, there are about 3 million people living with this disease, and this number is increasing, especially among teenagers. Therefore, self-testing and evaluating mental health status is extremely important.
aboutSection.whyP3: Online depression tests on reputable websites like Testtramcam.vn can help you accurately determine the severity of depression. From there, you can find timely intervention methods to improve the quality of life effectively. Take a moment to test now!
aboutSection.trustP1: Depression tests at MindMeter are developed based on the research of mental health experts worldwide, and then translated into Vietnamese to suit Vietnamese people. They are reviewed and certified by mental health experts and reputable organizations in Vietnam.
aboutSection.trustP2: In addition to accurately determining the type of depression, these tests also classify by age and target group, and suggest appropriate treatment methods. With guaranteed quality, this is a reliable tool for you to self-evaluate your mental health status.
aboutSection.trustP3: All tests are free and provide quick results. The purpose of testtramcam.vn is to help people with mental symptoms quickly diagnose their condition.

introduce.intro1: is the leading online platform for mental health assessment, screening, and support in Vietnam. We provide depression, anxiety, stress, and postnatal depression tests based on scientific scales, helping you identify mental issues early and proactively care for your mental health and that of your loved ones.
introduce.mission: is to raise awareness of mental health in the community, making it easy for everyone to access screening tools, evaluate, and receive timely support. We believe that mental health is as important as physical health, and active testing and prevention are the keys to a happy, successful life.
introduce.value2: Science - Reliable - Secure - Free - Easy to use
introduce.value3: All tests are based on international research, reviewed and certified by mental health experts, ensuring accuracy and reliability. MindMeter guarantees absolute privacy of personal information, and only you can view the test results. All tests are free, user-friendly, and easy to use on any device.
introduce.strength1: Take depression, anxiety, stress, postnatal depression tests with detailed analysis and easy-to-understand results.
introduce.strength2: Receive advice and guidance based on test results, helping you proactively care for your mental health.
introduce.strength3: Store test history and track your mental health progress over time.
introduce.strength4: Modern interface, multi-device support, easy to use anytime, anywhere.
introduce.strength5: Support consultation, connect with experts when needed.
introduce.vision: is to become the leading online mental health support platform in Vietnam, contributing to building a healthy, happy, and stigma-free community.
introduce.why: Because we not only provide test tools but also accompany you on the journey of caring for your mental health. MindMeter always updates new tests, scientific knowledge, and expands the network of experts to bring the best value to the community.

studentHome.testOnlineP1: Online depression tests are a reliable and necessary tool for everyone. If you ignore the symptoms of depression and are not treated in time, the consequences can be very serious. People with prolonged depression may experience physical health issues, sleep problems, reduced productivity, and even thoughts of suicide.
studentHome.testOnlineP2: Therefore, if you are concerned about your mental symptoms, depression, anxiety, or stress, please take the depression tests at MindMeter.vn to get an accurate diagnosis. From there, you can seek help from experts and apply appropriate treatment methods. This not only helps you improve the quality of life but also prevents serious consequences from happening. Don't hesitate, take the depression tests today for your own health and happiness!

faq.title: Common questions about depression tests
faq.desc: Below are some of the questions and issues often encountered by people with depression.

list.a: MindMeter is a mental health assessment platform that helps users evaluate their psychological well-being through scientifically validated tests.
Our platform offers various psychological assessments including depression screening, anxiety tests, and other mental health evaluations.
Yes, we prioritize your privacy and data security. All personal information is encrypted and protected according to strict privacy standards.
Yes, we connect users with qualified mental health professionals for consultations and support when needed.

list.q: How accurate are the test results?
list.a: Our tests are based on scientifically validated psychological assessments and provide reliable indicators of mental health status.

list.q: What should I do if I get concerning results?
list.a: If you receive concerning results, we recommend consulting with a mental health professional for proper evaluation and support.

fallback.answer1: MindMeter is a mental health assessment platform that helps users evaluate their psychological well-being through scientifically validated tests.
fallback.answer2: Our platform offers various psychological assessments including depression screening, anxiety tests, and other mental health evaluations.
fallback.answer3: Yes, we prioritize your privacy and data security. All personal information is encrypted and protected according to strict privacy standards.
fallback.answer4: Yes, we connect users with qualified mental health professionals for consultations and support when needed.

footer.slogan: We understand the connection between physical health and emotions. Our counselors, partners, and mental health doctors work with the doctor of the patient to improve the overall health and well-being.
footer.contactDesc: For any suggestions, you can contact us via email:

loginRequired.title: Please login to receive MindMeter notifications

securityPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
securityPolicy.intro: MindMeter commits to protecting your information and data with the most advanced security measures. This policy describes in detail how we protect your information from security threats.

measures.title: Security Measures
measures.intro: We apply multiple layers of security to protect your information:
measures.encryptionDesc: All sensitive data is encrypted with AES-256 and transmitted via HTTPS/TLS 1.3.
measures.accessDesc: Multi-factor authentication and strict access control system.
measures.monitoringDesc: 24/7 security monitoring system with automatic alerts.

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.intro: We ensure your data is always protected:
protection.backupDesc: Data is automatically backed up daily at high-security data centers.
protection.recoveryDesc: The system quickly recovers data in case of an emergency.

incident.title: Security Incident Handling
incident.intro: We have a professional security incident handling process:
incident.detectionDesc: The AI system detects and alerts security threats in real-time.
incident.responseDesc: The security team responds within 15 minutes and handles the incident within 4 hours.

compliance.title: Compliance with International Standards
compliance.intro: We comply with international security standards:
compliance.standardsDesc: Comply with ISO 27001, SOC 2 Type II, and GDPR to ensure maximum security.
compliance.certificationDesc: Certified by reputable international security organizations.

contact.title: Security Contact
contact.intro: If you discover any security issues or have any questions:

translationHint: This interface helps you edit questions in one language and preview them in another. Please fill in content for both languages.
formIncomplete: Please fill in all required information

hero.title: Welcome to MindMeter!
hero.description: This is your intelligent mental health assessment platform. Here you can take various professional psychological tests to better understand your mental health status in a safe and accurate way.

tests.title: Psychological Tests Section
tests.description: This section contains 6 professional psychological assessment tools including DASS-21, DASS-42, BDI, RADS, EPDS, and SAS tests. Each test is specially designed for specific age groups and purposes, helping you get a comprehensive view of your mental health.

dass21.title: DASS-21 Test - Most Important
dass21.description: This is the most important test for depression, anxiety, and stress assessment. It consists of 21 scientifically designed questions and takes about 5-10 minutes to complete. Perfect for quick and accurate screening.

bdi.title: BDI Test - International Standard
bdi.description: Beck Depression Inventory is the most popular and trusted test for depression assessment. With 21 standardized questions, this is a tool widely used by mental health professionals worldwide.

chatbot.title: Smart AI Assistant
chatbot.description: Click here to chat with our intelligent AI assistant. You can ask questions about mental health, get appropriate test recommendations, or even book appointments with experts automatically and conveniently.

profile.title: Personal Account Management
profile.description: Access your personal profile, view test history, manage appointments, and account settings. You can also upgrade your account to unlock premium features and better experience.

navigation.title: Smart Navigation Menu
navigation.description: Use this menu to navigate between different sections: Home, About, Test List, and Contact. You can also access privacy policy, user guide, and other important information from here.

aiInsights.title: AI Mental Health Insights
aiInsights.subtitle: Intelligent analysis powered by GPT-4o-mini
aiInsights.chartTitle: Line Chart: Mental Health Risk Trend

blog.subtitle: Share your mental health journey and connect with others
